<<<<<<< HEAD
Loves wound and loves cure the tune is, The VVandering spirits in the air.
1 sheet ([2] p.) : ill. (woodcuts)
Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere and J. VVright, [S.l.] : [1663-1674]
Caption title. Imprint from colophon. Date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.). Verses in black letter, chorus lines in Roman. Imperfect: broadside cropped with slight loss of print. Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
=======
